conclusion: Determine which container (E, F, or G) liquid will flow into after passing through baffles.
Liquid flows from A, B, C, and D.
Liquid from A flows down and hits the black baffle.
Liquid from A redirects towards the middle.
Liquid from A hits the yellow baffle and flows towards the red container (F).
Liquid from B flows down and hits the black baffle.
Liquid from B redirects towards the middle.
Liquid from B hits the yellow baffle and flows towards the green container (E).
Liquid from C flows down and hits the yellow baffle.
Liquid from C redirects towards the right side.
Liquid from C hits the grey baffle and flows towards the red container (F).
Liquid from D flows down directly into the white container (G).
Container E (Green) receives flow from B.
Container F (Red) receives flow from A and C.
Container G (White) receives flow from D.
Final answer: Container E (Green) receives flow from B, Container F (Red) receives flow from A and C, Container G (White) receives flow from D.
